_header: To the blissful Trinity be done all reverence
_description: Introductory couplet in one MS to the Prick of Conscience (5398)

BLEge3245.Transcription: To þe blisful Trinite be don al reuerensIn whos name I begyn þe prikil of consciens
BLEge3245.Note: Added by a different hand and black ink below 1299.
BLEge3245.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90: 371.
